name: Pneuma
description:
Pneuma is a first person action, roguelike game with creative mechanics and a unique art style. The player will have to fight their way through ‘dungeons’ using elemental attacks to make their way through to the next level. 

Pneuma focuses on a unique mechanical system which the player must interact with at every turn. The player mechanics are designed so that the player must use a series of elements to defeat their enemies in style. 

Mechanics

Along your journey through the spirit world you will encounter many obstacles on your path, and will need to use your abilities to overpower them. You may encounter and experience:

  • A elemental loadout system, to select what you may need across your journey
  • The ability to combine your spells together, becoming stronger in the process
  • Communicating with those of the realm, buying items and improving upon your spells
  • Combating those whos spirits have fallen, corrupted by their will not to pass on 
  • A narrative, explored through the friends you will meet as they help you on your journey 
Panda Egg Studios

We are team Panda Egg, a small team of Media Design School students, who have been in development  of this product since the start of 2022. The game was created in Unity Engine, using version 2019.36.

Panda Egg is comprised of programmers Sebastian Valentine, Rowan Moss and Ayden Lim-Yip; as well as artists Jordan Lusis, Cagaratano Wiharja, Bronwyn Woodhead and Tyler Laing.
